term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - air monitoring station in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: air monitoring station

item.text: A site at which monitoring of the concentration of one or more pollutants is carried out (e.g. the BAPMoN stations, Background Air Pollution Monitoring Network of the WMO, World Meteorological Organization).

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2172 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
